column2: "Greetings. My name is Ecru. I was built for battle, and it is battle alone that brings me joy in life."
"How many powerful enemies are there in this world that we have yet to face? Just the thought of it makes me ache with anticipation!"
"...Ahem. Do excuse me. There is something that I would like you to bring me, so that I may be all the readier when new foes present themselves."
"Do you know of the mysterious stone known as \"Water Crystal\"? It is said to be the finest whetstone in all the universe."
"I wish to use it to bring out the true power of my weapons, so that I may meet our enemies at full strength. I will be grateful for your assistance."
